title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
Introducing the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet! This top-of-the-line welding helmet is perfect for various welding processes such as TIG, MIG, and MMA.

Featuring a wide viewing size of 3.64 inches in width and 1.67 inches in height, you'll have an excellent field of vision while working. With two sensors and a switch speed of 1/30000 seconds, this helmet offers rapid and accurate auto darkening for your convenience and safety.

The optical clarity of this helmet is exceptional, rated at 1/1/1/1. This ensures crystal clear vision with minimal distortion, allowing you to focus on your work with precision. Plus, the lens compatibility includes options for Cheater Lens and Magnifying Lens, providing additional flexibility for your specific needs.

Say goodbye to frequent battery replacements! The YESWELDER welding helmet comes with an increased battery life, allowing you to work without interruption for extended periods. The superior comfort provided by the pivot style headgear ensures a secure and comfortable fit, reducing fatigue during long welding sessions.

With a shade range of 4 to 13, you have the flexibility to adjust the darkness level according to your welding requirements. Whether you're a professional welder or a DIY enthusiast, this YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet is the perfect companion for your welding projects.

Invest in the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet and experience enhanced safety, comfort, and efficiency during your welding projects.

Equipped with 2 sensors, the helmet ensures quick and accurate darkening as soon as the welding arc is detected, protecting your eyes and face from harmful UV and IR radiation. With a switch speed of 1/30000 seconds, the transition from light to dark is seamless, eliminating any disruptions and allowing you to focus on your work.

The optical clarity of this helmet is unparalleled, boasting a rating of 1/1/1/1. The superior comfort provided by the pivot-style headgear ensures a secure yet comfortable fit, reducing fatigue and enhancing your overall productivity.

With a shade range of 4 to 13, you have complete control over the darkness level, adapting to different welding applications and environments. Whether you're working on light or heavy-duty projects, this helmet has got you covered.
